title: Metal Band, Die So Fluid, Egami Vivid Studios Video Montage,
description: This month on video you will see trailers and video clips of Metal rock band hailing from London, Die So Fluid (www.diesofluid.net /with their latest single release from their album &#039;Not Everybody Gets A Happy Ending,&#039; on Renaissance Records, via Koch Entertainment Distribution USA. The band will be in Phoenix, Arizona shooting a new video during the last week of April 2008. Indie film short "Switch"a story about the romantic entanglements among a group of friends, based on the book of the same name and screenplay by Annette Johnson of AllWrite Publishing (www.e-allwrite.com) in Atlanta. Egami Vivid Production Studios (www. egamivivid.com /of Los Angeles and Toronto, with short film project "Rice Counter, Ice Sleeper," a stylized story of romance, passion, temptation and self control, and other works of Director J. Wesley Bassard. The Actor&#039;s Checklist now lets you check the latest musical artists song releases on Apple&#039;s iTunes, updated on an hourly basis, at: http://www.actorschecklist.com/resources/itunes.php
